pages.text: To make $(item)Refractory Brick$(), you need $(item)Flint Clay$().$(p)$(info) First, crush $(item)Flint Shards$() to produce $(item)Crushed Flint$().$(p)$(info) Next, melt $(item)Clay$() into $(item)Liquid Clay$().$(p)$(info) Finally, soak the $(item)Crushed Flint$() in the $(item)Liquid Clay$() to obtain $(item)Flint Clay$().

Next, you need $(item)Slaked Lime$().$(p)$(info) First, crush $(item)Limestone Rocks$() to produce $(item)Crushed Limestone$().$(p)$(info) Next, fire the $(item)Crushed Limestone$() into $(item)Quicklime$().$(p)$(info) Finally, soak the $(item)Quicklime$() in $(item)Water$() to obtain $(item)Slaked Lime$().
